div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 984 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1907 Burial: late 6th-5th cent. B.C. Contents: AE Olbia: fish-shaped AE Disposition: dispersed OAK 1907 (publ. 1910), p. 66 Drevnii mir na iuge Rossii, Izbornik istochnikov (Moscow, 1918), p. 45, fig. 41
